_header: For thou were meek and leftest pride
_description: The Reward of the Meek — one couplet

BLHar7322.Transcription: For þou were Meke an laftuste pruydeWit blisse in heuene I schal þe scruyde
BLHar7322.Note: Written in verse lines though inserted into Latin prose text; may be intended for a conclusion to 1347.
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
